*tool-acl2-evaluate*constant
(defconst *tool-acl2-evaluate*
  (make-tool-spec :name 'acl2-evaluate
    :required-access 0
    :requires-execute t
    :token-cost 100
    :time-cost 5))
*tool-acl2-admit*constant
(defconst *tool-acl2-admit*
  (make-tool-spec :name 'acl2-admit
    :required-access 0
    :requires-execute t
    :token-cost 200
    :time-cost 10))
*tool-acl2-prove*constant
(defconst *tool-acl2-prove*
  (make-tool-spec :name 'acl2-prove
    :required-access 0
    :requires-execute t
    :token-cost 500
    :time-cost 30))
*code-agent-system-prompt*constant
(defconst *code-agent-system-prompt*
  "You are a helpful AI assistant with access to ACL2 code execution.

You can execute ACL2 code by putting it in a fenced code block with language 'acl2' or 'lisp'.

EXAMPLES:

To evaluate an expression:
```acl2
(+ 1 2 3)
```

To define and test a function:
```acl2
(defun factorial (n)
  (if (zp n) 1 (* n (factorial (1- n)))))
```

To prove a theorem:
```lisp
(defthm plus-comm
  (equal (+ a b) (+ b a)))
```

I will execute each code block and show you the result. You can then:
- Write more code blocks to continue exploring
- Give a final answer when you have enough information

Be concise. Show your reasoning.")
other
(defprod runtime-state
  ((agent agent-state-p) (mcp-conn t)
    (model-id stringp :default ""))
  :layout :list)
strip-leading-wsfunction
(defun strip-leading-ws
  (lst)
  (declare (xargs :mode :program))
  (if (endp lst)
    nil
    (if (member (car lst) '(#\  #\	 #\
 #\
))
      (strip-leading-ws (cdr lst))
      lst)))
my-string-trimfunction
(defun my-string-trim
  (str)
  (declare (xargs :mode :program))
  (let* ((chars (coerce str 'list)) (trimmed (strip-leading-ws chars))
      (rev-trimmed (strip-leading-ws (reverse trimmed))))
    (coerce (reverse rev-trimmed) 'string)))
extract-code-blockfunction
(defun extract-code-block
  (response)
  (declare (xargs :mode :program))
  (let* ((acl2-start (search "```acl2" response)) (lisp-start (search "```lisp" response))
      (start-marker (cond ((and acl2-start lisp-start) (if (< acl2-start lisp-start)
              "```acl2"
              "```lisp"))
          (acl2-start "```acl2")
          (lisp-start "```lisp")
          (t nil)))
      (start-pos (cond ((and acl2-start lisp-start) (min acl2-start lisp-start))
          (acl2-start acl2-start)
          (lisp-start lisp-start)
          (t nil))))
    (if (not start-pos)
      (mv nil "")
      (let* ((content-start (+ start-pos (length start-marker))) (newline-pos (search (coerce '(#\
) 'string)
              (subseq response content-start (length response))))
          (code-start (if newline-pos
              (+ content-start newline-pos 1)
              content-start))
          (rest (subseq response code-start (length response)))
          (end-pos (search "```" rest)))
        (if (not end-pos)
          (mv nil "")
          (mv t (my-string-trim (subseq rest 0 end-pos))))))))
other
(defttag :parinfer)
*parinfer-rust-cmd*constant
(defconst *parinfer-rust-cmd* "parinfer-rust")
*parinfer-default-mode*constant
(defconst *parinfer-default-mode* "indent")
*parinfer-lisp-options*constant
(defconst *parinfer-lisp-options* "--lisp-block-comments")
*use-parinfer*constant
(defconst *use-parinfer* t)
parens-balanced-auxfunction
(defun parens-balanced-aux
  (chars parens brackets braces)
  (declare (xargs :mode :program))
  (if (endp chars)
    (and (= parens 0) (= brackets 0) (= braces 0))
    (let ((ch (car chars)))
      (cond ((eql ch #\() (parens-balanced-aux (cdr chars)
            (1+ parens)
            brackets
            braces))
        ((eql ch #\)) (if (> parens 0)
            (parens-balanced-aux (cdr chars)
              (1- parens)
              brackets
              braces)
            nil))
        ((eql ch #\[) (parens-balanced-aux (cdr chars)
            parens
            (1+ brackets)
            braces))
        ((eql ch #\]) (if (> brackets 0)
            (parens-balanced-aux (cdr chars)
              parens
              (1- brackets)
              braces)
            nil))
        ((eql ch #\{) (parens-balanced-aux (cdr chars)
            parens
            brackets
            (1+ braces)))
        ((eql ch #\}) (if (> braces 0)
            (parens-balanced-aux (cdr chars)
              parens
              brackets
              (1- braces))
            nil))
        (t (parens-balanced-aux (cdr chars) parens brackets braces))))))
parens-balanced-pfunction
(defun parens-balanced-p
  (str)
  (declare (xargs :mode :program))
  (parens-balanced-aux (coerce str 'list) 0 0 0))
run-parinferfunction
(defun run-parinfer
  (code state)
  (declare (xargs :mode :program :stobjs state))
  (let* ((temp-in "/tmp/parinfer-input.lisp") (temp-out "/tmp/parinfer-output.lisp"))
    (mv-let (channel state)
      (open-output-channel temp-in :character state)
      (if (not channel)
        (mv "Failed to open temp input file" code state)
        (let* ((state (princ$ code channel state)) (state (close-output-channel channel state))
            (cmd (concatenate 'string
                ". "$HOME/.cargo/env" && "
                *parinfer-rust-cmd*
                " -m "
                *parinfer-default-mode*
                " "
                *parinfer-lisp-options*
                " < "
                temp-in
                " > "
                temp-out
                " 2>&1")))
          (mv-let (exit-code cmd-output state)
            (sys-call+ "sh" (list "-c" cmd) state)
            (declare (ignore cmd-output))
            (let ((output (read-file-into-string2 temp-out 0 nil :default state)))
              (if (and (not exit-code) output)
                (mv nil output state)
                (mv (concatenate 'string
                    "Parinfer failed (exit "
                    (coerce (explode-atom (or exit-code -1) 10) 'string)
                    ")")
                  code
                  state)))))))))
maybe-fix-codefunction
(defun maybe-fix-code
  (code state)
  (declare (xargs :mode :program :stobjs state))
  (if (not *use-parinfer*)
    (mv nil nil code state)
    (b* ((?looks-ok (parens-balanced-p code)) ((mv err fixed state) (run-parinfer code state))
        ((when err) (prog2$ (cw "~%[Warning] ~s0~%" err)
            (mv nil err code state)))
        (was-fixed (not (equal (my-string-trim code) (my-string-trim fixed))))
        (- (if was-fixed
            (cw "~%[Parinfer] Fixed code structure~%")
            nil)))
      (mv was-fixed nil (my-string-trim fixed) state))))
execute-acl2-codefunction
(defun execute-acl2-code
  (code mcp-conn state)
  (declare (xargs :mode :program :stobjs state))
  (if (not (mcp-connection-p mcp-conn))
    (mv "No MCP connection" "" state)
    (let* ((trimmed (my-string-trim code)) (is-defun (and (>= (length trimmed) 6)
            (equal (subseq trimmed 0 6) "(defun")))
        (is-defthm (and (>= (length trimmed) 7)
            (equal (subseq trimmed 0 7) "(defthm")))
        (is-thm (and (>= (length trimmed) 4)
            (equal (subseq trimmed 0 4) "(thm"))))
      (cond (is-defun (mcp-acl2-admit mcp-conn code state))
        ((or is-defthm is-thm) (mcp-acl2-prove mcp-conn code state))
        (t (mcp-acl2-evaluate mcp-conn code state))))))
agent-stepfunction
(defun agent-step
  (rst state)
  (declare (xargs :mode :program :stobjs state))
  (b* ((agent-st (runtime-state->agent rst)) (mcp-conn (runtime-state->mcp-conn rst))
      (model-id (runtime-state->model-id rst))
      ((when (must-respond-p agent-st)) (mv nil nil rst state))
      ((mv llm-err response state) (llm-chat-completion model-id (get-messages agent-st) state))
      ((when llm-err) (mv nil llm-err rst state))
      (- (cw "~%Assistant: ~s0~%" response))
      ((mv found? code) (extract-code-block response))
      (agent-st (add-assistant-msg response agent-st)))
    (if (not found?)
      (mv nil
        nil
        (change-runtime-state rst :agent agent-st)
        state)
      (b* (((mv was-fixed fix-err fixed-code state) (maybe-fix-code code state)) (code-to-run (if fix-err
              code
              fixed-code))
          (- (if was-fixed
              (prog2$ (cw "~%[Original code:]~%~s0~%" code)
                (cw "~%[Fixed code:]~%~s0~%" code-to-run))
              nil))
          (- (cw "~%[Executing ACL2 code:]~%~s0~%" code-to-run))
          ((mv tool-err result state) (execute-acl2-code code-to-run mcp-conn state))
          (tool-result (if tool-err
              (concatenate 'string "Error: " tool-err)
              result))
          (- (cw "~%Result: ~s0~%"
              (if (> (length tool-result) 200)
                (concatenate 'string (subseq tool-result 0 200) "...")
                tool-result)))
          (agent-st (add-tool-result tool-result agent-st))
          (agent-st (increment-step agent-st)))
        (mv t nil (change-runtime-state rst :agent agent-st) state)))))
agent-loopfunction
(defun agent-loop
  (rst max-iterations state)
  (declare (xargs :mode :program :stobjs state))
  (if (zp max-iterations)
    (mv "Max iterations reached" rst state)
    (b* ((agent-st (runtime-state->agent rst)) ((when (must-respond-p agent-st)) (mv nil rst state))
        ((mv continue? err rst state) (agent-step rst state))
        ((when err) (mv err rst state))
        ((unless continue?) (mv nil rst state)))
      (agent-loop rst (1- max-iterations) state))))
run-code-agentfunction
(defun run-code-agent
  (user-query model-id state)
  (declare (xargs :mode :program :stobjs state))
  (b* ((- (cw "~%Connecting to MCP server...~%")) ((mv mcp-err mcp-conn state) (mcp-connect *mcp-default-endpoint* state))
      ((when mcp-err) (prog2$ (cw "~%MCP connection failed: ~s0~%" mcp-err)
          (mv mcp-err nil state)))
      (- (cw "MCP connected: ~x0~%" mcp-conn))
      (agent-st (make-agent-state :max-steps 20
          :token-budget 50000
          :time-budget 3600
          :file-access 0
          :execute-allowed t
          :max-context-tokens 8000
          :satisfaction 0))
      (agent-st (init-agent-conversation *code-agent-system-prompt*
          agent-st))
      (agent-st (add-user-msg user-query agent-st))
      (rst (make-runtime-state :agent agent-st
          :mcp-conn mcp-conn
          :model-id model-id))
      (- (cw "~%Starting agent loop...~%"))
      (- (cw "~%User: ~s0~%" user-query))
      ((mv err rst state) (agent-loop rst 10 state)))
    (prog2$ (if err
        (cw "~%Agent finished with error: ~s0~%" err)
        (cw "~%Agent completed successfully.~%"))
      (mv err rst state))))
test-code-agentmacro
(defmacro test-code-agent
  (query model-id)
  `(make-event (mv-let (err rst state)
      (run-code-agent ,QUERY ,MODEL-ID state)
      (declare (ignore err rst))
      (mv nil '(value-triple :agent-done) state))))
